lead_paragraph: A truck carrying fuel veered off the road, caught fire and exploded on Thursday, killing at least 95 people who rushed to scoop fuel that had spilled, said Yushau Shuaib, a spokesman for the emergency management agency.
snippet: A truck carrying fuel veered off the road, caught fire and exploded on Thursday, killing at least 95 people who rushed to scoop fuel that had spilled, said Yushau Shuaib, a spokesman for the emergency management agency....

headline.print_headline: Nigeria: Dozens Killed in Tanker Fire
headline.main: Nigeria: Dozens Killed in Tanker Fire

abstract: Truck carrying fuel veers off the road, catches fire and explodes in southern Nigeria, killing at least 95 people who rushed to scoop fuel that had spilled; at least 50 others are injured.
